description:
Keroro has a toothache -- which is a big deal to his people.  It means micro-aliens have invaded his mouth and are setting up a secret base in one of his teeth!  Now his comrades have to shrink down to micro size and blast away those invaders... or at least try not to injure Keroro much farther!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`arrivée de l`envahisseur extraterrestre microscopique super Dary
Sgt. Frog Versus the Cavitians of Cavity 9!
決戦! 第三大臼歯 であります
